basic.description:
Seminars offered by faculty related to their music education research/interests. Content varies year to year. See departmental brochure for further details.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Topics In Music Education II

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    (MUSC 273/3.0 and MUSC 274/3.0 and [MUSC 332/3.0 or MUSC 336/3.0 or MUSC 338/3.0) or permission of the School.
